Class CheckoutController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rastkosprojects.springbootecommerce.controller.CheckoutController

  • @CrossOrigin(value="http://localhost:4200")
 @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/checkout")
public class CheckoutController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class which controls communication with checkout.

      • placeOrder

        @PostMapping(value="/purchase")
public PurchaseResponse placeOrder(@RequestBody
                                                                   Purchase purchase)
        Method which responds to the post mapping for purchase. Places the order by saving the order with the checkout service and creating a response.
        Parameters:
        purchase - Purchase objects with the order parameters
        Returns:
        PurchaseResponse response which will be sent to the front-end
